title: Freelance Marketplace
description: A platform connecting clients and freelancers to post, bid, and manage freelance tasks with ease.

features.name: User Authentication
features.details: Secure login and registration using Firebase authentication.

features.name: Project Bidding System
features.details: Freelancers can bid on projects with proposals, and clients can review and accept bids.

features.name: Role-based Access
features.details: Different dashboards and permissions for clients and freelancers.

features.name: Project Management
features.details: Track project progress from bidding to completion.

technologies.name: Tailwind CSS
technologies.reason: Used for rapid, mobile-friendly, and responsive styling.

technologies.name: Node.js
technologies.reason: Backend runtime for handling asynchronous operations efficiently.

technologies.name: Express
technologies.reason: Used to build and manage API endpoints for server logic.

technologies.name: MongoDB

technologies.name: Firebase
technologies.reason: Handles authentication and real-time hosting.
